resources.string:
The goal is to turn all the lights OUT! 


You can do so by pressing the buttons. 

There are three types of buttons: corner, edge, and center. 

Corner buttons toggle the four lights in the corner on and off. 

Edge buttons toggle the two neighboring lights on and off. 

The center button toggles itself and the four lights surrounding it on and off. 

Use these to turn the lights out! 


Or are you scared of the dark?
